bibl.title: The Legend of the Sun's Eye: The Translation of an Egyptian Novel into Greek.
Cultures in Contact. Transfer of Knowledge in the Mediterranean Context. Selected Papers

bibl.note: The Demotic version(s) of the Myth. - The Greek version of the myth [P. Lond. Inv. 274 = P. lit. Lond. 192 (= M.-P.3 2618; LDAB 5054), fr. A col. 1, 27-32.]
bibl.seg: Frank Feder, The Legend of the Sun's Eye: The Translation of an Egyptian Novel into Greek.

Sofía Torallas Tovar & Juan Pedro Monferrer-Sala (edd.), Cultures in Contact. Transfer of Knowledge in the Mediterranean Context. Selected Papers = Series Syro-Arabica. 1 (Córdoba, 2013) pp. 3-12, 1 fig. coul., 1 pl. coul.
